Method Detail

getEmpiricalROC

protected static double[][] getEmpiricalROC(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> probWhenObsYes,
                                            java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> probWhenObsNo,
                                            int count)
Returns the POFD and POD from the input, with the POD in the second row.

Parameters:
probWhenObsYes - the forecast probabilities when the event occurs, sorted
probWhenObsNo - the forecast probabilities when the event does not occur, sorted
count - the number of points aside from the origin (i.e. 1 will be added)
Returns:
the POFD and POD
